## Description {#details}

An abstract interface for indirect call information interference.

### foreachCallee() {#a85e7ae5e85459c5c38584d5c0cb0586e}

Call \\CB on each potential callee value and return true if all were known and <code>CB</code> returned true on all of them.

Otherwise, return false.
